content.html:
What Else Musk is doing by stepping away as CEO and employing a women is likely a sign that Twitter is in real trouble and he needs, well, a fall...girl.

This has been seen before and is termed the #GlassCliff where companies who are in crisis employ a woman to blame when she eventually can't fix all the issues and the company inevitably fails.

If so, Twitter will likely be filing for bankruptcy within a couple of years.

There's no way Musk will be doing this because it's a positive thing.
content.value:

If so, Twitter will likely be filing for bankruptcy within a couple of years.
